item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
Introduction

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files. It also shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

Headings

The following HTML <h2>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is reserved for the page title.

H2

H3

H4

H5
H6

Paragraph
